rules.description: Change caps_lock to ❖ Hyper (⇧^⌥⌘) modifier key. Uses ⎋ Escape when typed alone
Change right option to ✪ Markdown (⇧^⌥) modifier key.
Toggle caps_lock by pressing left_shift + right_shift at the same time
